questions.quote: Anna. I don't recall seeing you around the office. Do you work in the mail room?
Hello, yes, I called for an ambulance like thirty-five minutes ago.
Jerry if you have something to do we could just sit right here and read.
Oh yeah the nipple. But besides that. How did you feel about Kramer's work?
Yeah, yeah, I'm alright. Oh, by the way, the car hit a pothole and now it's making a clanking noise.
It's Kramer isn't it? I knew it!  The greasy door knob the constant licking of the fingers, he's hooked to the chicken isn't he?
I couldn't have dinner with him. 'Plan 9 from Outer Space', one night only, the big screen. My hands are tied!
That poor priest. He was just visiting from El Salvador. Now he's gone completely loco.
So I'm sitting there with Woody and I say, I turn to him and I go, "Boy, these pretzels are making me thirsty."
He doesn't have to say anything, he just has to sit there. I'm playing a detective.
